snippet: President Barack Obama's best-laid plans to go all out for Democrats in the final weeks of the midterms are running smack into a widening Ebola crisis, as Americans anxiously turn to the government and their president for answers....

headline.print_headline: Obama Juggles Campaign Duties With Ebola Response
headline.main: Obama Juggles Campaign Duties With Ebola Response

lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama's best-laid plans to go all out for Democrats in the final weeks of the midterms are running smack into a widening Ebola crisis, as Americans anxiously turn to the government and their president for answers.
